release.action: Added a PropertiesBuilder in place of Configuration object. This allows the user to specify properties in any order and still allows for keyword swapping.

Removed the use of ExecutorServices and internal threading. This will allow this library to be used with Application Servers that prefer to manage their own threads. Instead the ConfigurationUtilities object has a "forceReconfigure" method that will reconfigure all of the beans associated to a given source.
Added a PropertiesBuilder factory to increase flexibility of library configurations.
Changed the logging framework to Apache Commons Logging. This removes the dependency on Log4J from the user.
Moved to Maven Central Repository in order to remove dependency on an additional repository.
